about_us.trust_subtitle: Built for the modern hospitality industry
about_us.mission_statement: We turn complex hotel operations into a seamless, positive guest and manager experience.
about_us.mission_description: To empower hotels with cutting-edge technology that transforms the hospitality industry and creates exceptional experiences for both guests and staff.
about_us.problem_description: Legacy hotel software is expensive, complicated, and can't easily handle multiple properties. Traditional systems create barriers instead of solutions.
about_us.solution_description: AuraStay is a single, streamlined system built specifically for multi-hotel management and designed to elevate the guest experience.
about_us.global_architecture_text: We are built for international scale, allowing you to manage a single boutique hotel or a chain across continents from one secure login.
about_us.data_security_text: Your data is completely isolated and secure. We use advanced architecture to ensure that the bookings from one hotel are never visible to another.
about_us.modern_tech_text: Built on modern, stable, and secure technology (Python/Django and PostgreSQL) to ensure 99.9% uptime.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.content:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using AuraStay's hotel management platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

2. Service Description

AuraStay provides a comprehensive hotel management software solution including but not limited to:

  • Reservation management system
  • Guest relationship management
  • Billing and payment processing
  • Housekeeping and maintenance tracking
  • Analytics and reporting tools

3. User Responsibilities

Users are responsible for:

  • Maintaining the confidentiality of account credentials
  • Ensuring accurate data entry and management
  • Complying with applicable laws and regulations
  • Proper use of the platform in accordance with these terms

4. Payment Terms

Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law.

5. Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure, and users acknowledge this inherent risk.

6. Limitation of Liability

AuraStay's liability is limited to the amount paid for the service in the preceding 12 months.

7. Termination

Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice. Upon termination, access to the platform will be revoked.

8. Contact Information

For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@aurastay.com

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
1. Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as:

  • Account registration information
  • Hotel and guest data you input into our system
  • Communication preferences and support requests
  • Payment and billing information

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our services
  • Process transactions and send related information
  • Send technical notices and support messages
  • Respond to your comments and questions

3. Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except:

  • With your explicit consent
  • To comply with legal obligations
  • To protect our rights and safety
  • With trusted service providers under strict confidentiality agreements

4. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures including:

  • Encryption of data in transit and at rest
  • Regular security audits and updates
  • Access controls and authentication systems
  • Employee training on data protection

5. Data Retention

We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services, comply with legal obligations, and resolve disputes.

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access and update your personal information
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Object to processing of your information
  • Data portability where applicable

7. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze usage patterns, and improve our services.

8. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions, contact us at privacy@aurastay.com
